channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 法廷審問：MLBの弁護士によると、ダイヤモンドとコムキャストとの争いは、球団とファンに損害を与え、ダイヤモンドの再建と破産からの脱出計画を危うくしている（Jonathan Randles/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Jonathan Randles / Bloomberg:
Court hearing: an MLB lawyer says Diamond's dispute with Comcast is harming its teams, fans, and jeopardizing Diamond's plan to restructure and exit bankruptcy  —  - Diamond lawyer said Comcast negotiations are ongoing  — MLB said it may have to set up alternate broadcasts for teams

item.title: RedBirdとKKRが支援するデヴィッド・エリソン率いるSkydanceと、ストリーミング時代を生き抜くための戦いであるApolloとソニーによる、競合するパラマウントの入札について見てみよう（Financial Times）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
A look at the competing Paramount bids from David Ellison's Skydance, backed by RedBird and KKR, and Apollo and Sony, a fight over surviving the streaming era  —  The tussle for the venerable studio has been billed as the money men against the creatives, but the outcome may help decide who survives in the streaming era

item.title: EU大使団、「ボイス・オブ・ヨーロッパ」や「RIAノーボスチ」などロシアメディア4社を制裁リストに加えることで基本合意、プロパガンダ懸念で（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
EU ambassadors agree in principle to put four Russian media outlets, including Voice of Europe and RIA Novosti, on its sanctions list over propaganda concerns  —  EU ambassadors agreed in principle on Wednesday to place four Russian media outlets on its sanctions list, accusing them of propaganda …

item.title: ESPNによると、ケイトリン・クラークのインディアナ・フィーバーでのWNBAデビュー戦は、ESPNのプラットフォームで過去最も視聴されたWNBAの試合となり、210万人の視聴者を集め、ピーク時には230万人を記録した（アントニオ・プラナス／NBCニュース）。
item.description:
Antonio Planas / NBC News:
ESPN says Caitlin Clark's WNBA debut game for the Indiana Fever was the most-watched WNBA game on ESPN platforms ever, drawing 2.1M viewers and peaking at 2.3M  —  Clark's first game as a pro scored 2.1 million viewers, making it the highest-rated WNBA game in the league's history across the ESPN platforms.

item.title: YouTubeが「YouTube Select Creator Takeovers」を正式に開始、YouTubeコンテンツの上位1％を代表するチャンネルの在庫を広告主に買い取らせる（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
YouTube formally launches YouTube Select Creator Takeovers, to let advertisers buy out the inventory on channels representing the top 1% of YouTube content  —  Video platform also inks deal to bring WNBA Friday night games to YouTube TV … At its annual Brandcast event …

item.title: 元CNN社長で現RedBird IMI CEOのジェフ・ザッカーが、UAEが支援したテレグラフ紙買収を阻止したレッドバードを擁護（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Former CNN President and current RedBird IMI CEO Jeff Zucker defends RedBird's blocked bid to take over The Telegraph, which was backed by the UAE  —  Ex-CNN president Jeff Zucker has suggested critics of his failed Telegraph deal were simply “scared” of it.

item.title: The MarkupのCEOとBuzzFeedのアソシエート・ゼネラル・カウンセルを務めたNabiha Syed氏が、Mozilla Foundationのエグゼクティブ・ディレクターに就任（Steven Melendez/Fast Company）
item.description:
Steven Melendez / Fast Company:
Nabiha Syed, previously CEO of The Markup and associate general counsel at BuzzFeed, joins the Mozilla Foundation as executive director  —  The Mozilla Foundation's new executive director was previously CEO of nonprofit tech news outlet The Markup.  —  Nabiha Syed, who was previously CEO …

item.title: 情報筋ParamountはAmazonとチャンネルのバンドル販売を含む提携拡大について協議、ある情報筋によれば、協議には広告も含まれるとのこと（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Paramount has had talks with Amazon about expanding ties, including bundled sales of channels; one source said the talks also involved advertising  —  The discussions may not amount to anything, but are said to include bundled sales of channels, according to the people …

item.title: CRTC、オンライン・ストリーミング法の制定を2025年後半まで延期、ストリーミング配信者と放送事業者がカナダと先住民のコンテンツを支援するために支払う金額を定める法律（Marie Woolf/Globe and Mail）
item.description:
Marie Woolf / Globe and Mail:
The CRTC delays Online Streaming Act enactment until late 2025; the law sets how much streamers and broadcasters pay to support Canadian and Indigenous content  —  ////The timetable for implementing the online streaming act has been delayed by a year, according to a new regulatory plan published …

item.title: CNNのジェイク・タッパーとダナ・バッシュは、6月27日にアトランタで行われるジョー・バイデンとドナルド・トランプの大統領選討論会で司会を務める（Ted Johnson/Deadline）
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
CNN's Jake Tapper and Dana Bash will moderate the June 27 presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump in Atlanta  —  Jake Tapper and Dana Bash will moderate the June 27 presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump, the network said.  —  Both candidates said today …

item.title: Netflixは、その広告層のMAUが2024年1月の23Mから40Mに増加し、独自の広告プラットフォームを立ち上げ、その技術のためにマイクロソフトとの提携を解消する計画であると述べている（CNBC）。
item.description:
CNBC:
Netflix says its ad tier has 40M MAUs, up from 23M in January 2024, and plans to launch its own ad platform and no longer partner with Microsoft for that tech  —  Netflix's cheaper, ad-supported tier has amassed 40 million global monthly active users, the company said Wednesday.

item.title: グアテマラの裁判所は、マネーロンダリング容疑で2年近く収監されていたジャーナリスト、José Rubén Zamoraの釈放を命じた。
item.description:
Sonia Pérez D. / Associated Press:
A Guatemalan court orders the release of journalist José Rubén Zamora, who was jailed for nearly two years on money laundering charges; he awaits a new trial  —  A Guatemalan court ordered the release Wednesday of journalist José Rubén Zamora, jailed for nearly two years on money laundering charges.

item.title: ニュース／メディア・アライアンスCEOのダニエル・コフィーは、グーグルのAIオーバービューの展開は破滅的で、パブリッシャーが得られるわずかなトラフィックはさらに減少するだろうと述べている（オリバー・ダーシー/CNN）。
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / CNN:
News/Media Alliance CEO Danielle Coffey says Google's AI Overviews rollout will be catastrophic, as the little traffic publishers get will be further diminished  —  Editor's Note: A version of this article first appeared in the “Reliable Sources” newsletter.  Sign up for the daily digest chronicling the evolving media landscape here.

item.title: 全米音楽出版社協会、Spotifyのビデオ機能やリミックス・ツールなどでの歌詞使用をめぐり、排除措置命令書を送付（Jem Aswad/Variety）
item.description:
Jem Aswad / Variety:
The National Music Publishers' Association sends a cease-and-desist letter to Spotify over its use of lyrics in its videos feature, remix tool, and more  —  Spotify was hit with a cease-and-desist letter from the National Music Publishers Assn. over its use of lyrics in its recently launched video function …

item.title: ジョー・バイデンとドナルド・トランプ、9月10日のABCニュース大統領討論会に合意（ABCニュース）
item.description:
ABC News:
Joe Biden and Donald Trump agree to an ABC News presidential debate on September 10  —  Biden challenged Trump to two debates, Trump said he's “ready and willing.”  —  President Joe Biden speaks at a campaign rally for Democratic gubernatorial candidate Wes Moore at Bowie State University on Nov. 7 …
